document.masterDocTitle: Description of the female terminalia of twenty species of Proconiini (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae) from Argentina

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Description of the female terminalia of twenty species of Proconiini (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae) from Argentina

subSubSection.paragraph: Diagnosis. Crown, pronotum and scutellum brownish, with small yellow spots irregularly arranged; forewings dark brown, with small yellowish spots arranged irregularly, and with reddish area along to costal margin; hindwing with vein R 2 + 3 incomplete. Male : aedeagus symmetrical, with pair of dorsal processes, arc-shaped and pair of thin ventral processes.

Material examined. ARGENTINA . Salta
